summary: Internal FBI email chain regarding obtaining supervisory concurrence for a Director's award nomination related to the Epstein/Maxwell case. The nomination is being submitted by the SDNY and has a deadline.

persons.name: ASAC
persons.context: The email requests that a form be printed and brought to ASAC for his signature as part of the award nomination concurrence process.

events.title: Award Nomination Concurrence Request
events.description: Internal FBI emails circulate a form requiring supervisory concurrence for a Director's award nomination related to the Epstein/Maxwell case, submitted by the SDNY.

keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) is submitting a nomination for a Director's award related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
The award nomination requires a formal concurrence form to be signed by an FBI Assistant Special Agent in Charge (ASAC).
The email chain indicates urgency, with the application due by Friday, June 24, 2022, and follow-ups on June 29, 2022.
